verses.name: Daniel 4:1
verses.text: Nebuchadnezzar the king, unto all people, nations, and languages, that dwell in all the earth; Peace be multiplied unto you.

verses.name: Daniel 4:2
verses.text: I thought it good to shew the signs and wonders that the high God hath wrought toward me.

verses.name: Daniel 4:3
verses.text: How great are his signs! and how mighty are his wonders! his kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and his dominion is from generation to generation.

verses.name: Daniel 4:4
verses.text: I Nebuchadnezzar was at rest in mine house, and flourishing in my palace:

verses.name: Daniel 4:5
verses.text: I saw a dream which made me afraid, and the thoughts upon my bed and the visions of my head troubled me.
